articles.author: Adam Marshall
articles.title: Laird seals move - Man Utd
articles.description: Our homegrown defender has clinched a permanent switch to a Championship club.
articles.content:
Now the youngster will be joining Birmingham, who have a good relationship with United after taking Hannibal on loan for the 2022/23 campaign.
Tahith Chong, a former team-mate of Laird's, is also a … [+457 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Farrand
articles.title: Preview: Tour de France 2023 Basque stages to inspire attacks and early GC battle - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Kwiatkowski: 'Stage 1 is one of the hardest ever Tour de France starts'
articles.content: The Tour de France has often begun with a prologue time trial or a flat road stage and sprint finish to help the riders settle into the three weeks of racing.  But this year’s race is different, very… [+8816 chars]
